# core.functions.asin { #optyx.core.functions.asin }

```python
core.functions.asin(x)
```

Inverse sine (arcsine).

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                             | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value in [-1, 1]. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                                               |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing arcsin(x), result in [-π/2, π/2]. |
